channel.title: Performance on RoosTech
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on RoosTech

item.title: Improving RemoteFX performance in Hyper-V
item.description: As I wrote earlier its possible to run RemoteFX on some of the slowest GPUÂ´s you can buy today (on a regular CPU actually), but you might not get the performance you need to get anywhere. This time I will go through some of the options you have for getting it to work a bit better. Keep in mind that I am writing this with a really poor GPU in mind (yes, the Intel HD 2500 is not good for anything else than browsing).
